interests.description: Keywords are read at runtime from interests.json (managed by reality_update_interests tool). Hobbies, likes, and wishes nudge significance classification but never filter out content.

significance_thresholds.notable_description: Meaningfully changed perspective, revealed new information, or had emotional/intellectual weight
significance_thresholds.pivotal_description: Fundamentally challenges existing beliefs, represents a crisis or breakthrough, or requires immediate identity-level response
